# Overview

The templates for the submission of fisheries statistics to the IOTC are available as plain Microsoft Excel&trade; spreadsheets to simplify the process of entering and submitting all required information This format allows the reporting officer to enter the data either _directly_ (i.e., by hand) or _programmatically_ (i.e., through automated scripts), for later submission by e-mail or via e-MARIS to the IOTC Secretariat.

## Form 1DR {#1DR}

For the submission of data on [species presence in the catch](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Species_presence_in_the_catch).

+ [Form description](./Form_1DR.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-1DR.xlsx)

## Form 1IN {#1IN}

For the submission data on [interactions of longline and surface fisheries with endangered, threatened, and protected (ETP) species](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Interactions_with_Endangered,_Threatened_and_Protected_species).

+ [Form description](./Form_1IN.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-1IN.xlsx)

## Form 1RC {#1RC}

For the submission of data on the total [amount of fish caught and retained](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Amount_of_fish_caught_and_retained).

+ [Form description](./Form_1RC.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-1RC.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/1RC/)

## Form 1DI {#1DI}

For the submission of data on the [amount of discards](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Amount_of_discards).

+ [Form description](./Form_1DI.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-1DI.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/1DI/)

## Form 3CE {#3CE}

For the submission of data on [geo-referenced catches and efforts](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Geo-referenced_catches_and_efforts).

This version of the form allows reporting data for multiple fisheries at the same time:

+ [Form description](./Form_3CE.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-3CE.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/3CE/)

This version of the form is suitable for the reporting of **updated** data for a specific fishery:

+ [Form description]( ./Form_3CE_update.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-3CE-update.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/update/3CE/)

## Form 4SF {#4SF}

For the submission of data on [geo-referenced size frequencies](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#Geo-referenced_size_frequencies).

This version of the form allows reporting data for multiple fisheries and species at the same time:

+ [Form description](./Form_4SF.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-4SF.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/4SF/)

This version of the form is suitable for the reporting of **updated** data for a specific fishery and species:

+ [Form description](./Form_4SF_update.html)
+ [Form template](./Form-4SF-update.xlsx)
+ [Interactive form validator](https://data.iotc.org/validators/ui/update/4SF/)

## Form 3AA {#3AA}

## Form 3DA{#3DA}

For the submission of data on [interactions related to drifting floating objects](https://data.iotc.org/reference/latest/guidelines/#DFOB-related_activities).
